foreignData.name: Karplusanischer Yeti
foreignData.text: Tap. Der Karplusanische Yeti fügt einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe seiner Stärke zu. Diese Kreatur fügt dem Karplusanischen Yeti Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

name: Karplusan Yeti
originalText:
oc
T: Karplusan Yeti deals an amount of damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals an amount of damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.

rulings.text: Giving either creature first strike does not affect the ability.

If this leaves the battlefield before its activated ability resolves, it will still deal damage to the targeted creature. On the other hand, if the targeted creature leaves the battlefield before the ability resolves, the ability won’t resolve and no damage will be dealt.

text: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.
